snippet: An airport’s size, passenger capacity and modernization in its bag handling all play a role....
abstract: Delta Air Lines says Flight 2262 passengers waited hour for luggage at Kennedy International Airport terminal due to bad weather that kept baggage handlers indoors; says it will offer affected customers frequent flier miles.
lead_paragraph: An airport’s size, passenger capacity and modernization in its bag handling all play a role.

headline.main: You’ve Reached Baggage Claim, but Why Hasn’t Your Luggage?
headline.print_headline: The Plane’s on Time. Why Isn‘t the Bag?
